TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Damayan, title = Damayan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Damayan} }

S.FORM: Damayan Itiniay i Wanrong Cen no Hualien ko Damayan a niyaro', 86 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 246 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 239 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 7 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun 87%, Paiwan 2%, roma 8%.

Damayan Itiniay i Wanrong Cen no Hoalien ko Damayan a niyaro', 86 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 246 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 239 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 7 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon 87%, Paiwan 2%, roma 8%.
